headline: Public Affairs Officer at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
Specialties: 
-Crisis Communications
-Strategic Communications
-Digital Communications
-Web Content Development
-Social Media Marketing

defaultPosition.description: Serves as U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement's (ICE) spokesperson for central and northern Florida and oversees the agency's public affairs efforts for this region.
defaultPosition.title: Public Affairs Officer

positions.description: Serves as U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement's (ICE) spokesperson for central and northern Florida and oversees the agency's public affairs efforts for this region.
positions.title: Public Affairs Officer

positions.description: Served as the Web content manager for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), a federal law enforcement agency within the U.S. Department of Homeland Security, consisting of more than 20,000 employees. Oversaw and developed content for all of ICE's online products, including ICE.gov, the ICE Intranet and several social media sites.
positions.title: Management and Program Analyst

positions.description: Served as the public affairs liaison for several city departments, board and commissions, and managed the city's social media efforts. Developed an award-winning SharePoint website, VBparents.com, for parents and educators living or working in Virginia Beach.
positions.title: Media and Communications Coordinator III

positions.description: Produced a weekly public affairs program, which aired on the Hampton Roads ABC affiliate.
positions.title: Television Producer (independent contractor)

positions.description: Provided public relations counsel and advertising services to a variety of agency clients, ranging from government agencies to corporations. Negotiated media buys, developed advertising and public relations campaigns, created websites, provided crisis communications counsel, planned special events and more.
positions.title: Account Manager
